scripts.build: npx tamagui-build --skip-types && cp -R src/assets/icons/*.svg dist/cjs/assets/icons/ && cp -R src/assets/icons/*.svg dist/esm/assets/icons/
scripts.watch: mkdir -p dist/cjs/assets/icons && mkdir -p dist/esm/assets/icons && cp -R src/assets/icons/*.svg dist/cjs/assets/icons/ && cp -R src/assets/icons/*.svg dist/esm/assets/icons/ && tamagui-build --watch --skip-types
